object.name: restrictChatMember
object.description: Use this method to restrict a user in a supergroup. The bot must be an administrator in the supergroup for this to work and must have the appropriate administrator rights. Pass True for all permissions to lift restrictions from a user. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to restrict a user in a supergroup. The bot must be an administrator in the supergroup for this to work and must have the appropriate administrator rights. Pass True for all permissions to lift restrictions from a user. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to restrict a user in a supergroup. The bot must be an administrator in the supergroup for this to work and must have the appropriate administrator rights. Pass :code:`True` for all permissions to lift restrictions from a user. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format :code:`@supergroupusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.name: user_id

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object for new user permissions
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized object for new user permissions
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object for new user permissions
annotations.name: permissions

annotations.description: Pass True if chat permissions are set independently. Otherwise, the can_send_other_messages and can_add_web_page_previews permissions will imply the can_send_messages, can_send_audios, can_send_documents, can_send_photos, can_send_videos, can_send_video_notes, and can_send_voice_notes permissions; the can_send_polls permission will imply the can_send_messages permission.
annotations.html_description: Pass True if chat permissions are set independently. Otherwise, the can_send_other_messages and can_add_web_page_previews permissions will imply the can_send_messages, can_send_audios, can_send_documents, can_send_photos, can_send_videos, can_send_video_notes, and can_send_voice_notes permissions; the can_send_polls permission will imply the can_send_messages permission.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if chat permissions are set independently. Otherwise, the *can_send_other_messages* and *can_add_web_page_previews* permissions will imply the *can_send_messages*, *can_send_audios*, *can_send_documents*, *can_send_photos*, *can_send_videos*, *can_send_video_notes*, and *can_send_voice_notes* permissions; the *can_send_polls* permission will imply the *can_send_messages* permission.
annotations.name: use_independent_chat_permissions

annotations.description: Date when restrictions will be lifted for the user; Unix time. If user is restricted for more than 366 days or less than 30 seconds from the current time, they are considered to be restricted forever
annotations.html_description: Date when restrictions will be lifted for the user; Unix time. If user is restricted for more than 366 days or less than 30 seconds from the current time, they are considered to be restricted forever
annotations.rst_description: Date when restrictions will be lifted for the user; Unix time. If user is restricted for more than 366 days or less than 30 seconds from the current time, they are considered to be restricted forever
annotations.name: until_date
